feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar use of informal language, including the use of profanity and colloquial expressions.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
